card.title: De Andere Krant - Regering Kiev en westen negeren ware toedracht Maidan-bloedbad: Eric van de Beek

_source.content: De massamoord op vreedzame demonstranten op het Maidan-plein in Kiev van negen jaar geleden was het werk van extreemrechtse milities. Dit met de bedoeling de toenmalige pro-Russische regering in een kwaad daglicht te stellen en omver te werpen. Volgens de Canadees-Oekraïense professor Ivan Katchanovski is het bewijs hiervoor overweldigend. Toch weigerde onlangs een wetenschappelijk tijdschrift Katchanovski’s studie te publiceren.Lees verder: https://www.deanderekrant.nl/nieuws/regering-kiev-en-westen-negeren-ware-toedracht-maidan-bloedbad-2023-01-31Auteur: Eric van de BeekArtikel in De Andere Krant: 28/01/2023
_source.contentraw:
De massamoord op vreedzame demonstranten op het Maidan-plein in Kiev van negen jaar geleden was het werk van extreemrechtse milities. Dit met de bedoeling de toenmalige pro-Russische regering in een kwaad daglicht te stellen en omver te werpen. Volgens de Canadees-Oekraïense professor Ivan Katchanovski is het bewijs hiervoor overweldigend. Toch weigerde onlangs een wetenschappelijk tijdschrift Katchanovski’s studie te publiceren.

Lees verder: https://www.deanderekrant.nl/nieuws/regering-kiev-en-westen-negeren-ware-toedracht-maidan-bloedbad-2023-01-31

_source.content: "Speaker McCarthy"Ilhan Omar said that my decision to remove her from the House Foreign Affairs committee, and Adam Schiff and Eric Swalwell from the Intelligence Committee, is a “threat to national security”.Let me be blunt: national security is precisely why I removed these three from their respective committees. I’ve said it many times before, and I’ll say it again:Adam Schiff’s abuse of his position on the Intel Committee to LIE in pursuit of President Trump proves his inability to put national security and integrity over partisan games.Eric Swalwell’s relationship with a Chinese spy is quite literally the definition of jeopardizing national security, which is why the FBI briefed me on the matter.And Ilhan Omar’s openly anti-semitic statements and stance directly imperil our alliance with our #1 ally in the Middle East: Israel.I am returning the Intelligence Committee to one of genuine honesty and credibility that regains the trust of the American people.I promised I’d restore accountability to your government. Now I am delivering, and the Democrats are FURIOUS.
_source.contentraw:
"Speaker McCarthy"

Ilhan Omar said that my decision to remove her from the House Foreign Affairs committee, and Adam Schiff and Eric Swalwell from the Intelligence Committee, is a “threat to national security”.

Let me be blunt: national security is precisely why I removed these three from their respective committees. I’ve said it many times before, and I’ll say it again:

Adam Schiff’s abuse of his position on the Intel Committee to LIE in pursuit of President Trump proves his inability to put national security and integrity over partisan games.

Eric Swalwell’s relationship with a Chinese spy is quite literally the definition of jeopardizing national security, which is why the FBI briefed me on the matter.

And Ilhan Omar’s openly anti-semitic statements and stance directly imperil our alliance with our #1 ally in the Middle East: Israel.

I am returning the Intelligence Committee to one of genuine honesty and credibility that regains the trust of the American people.

I promised I’d restore accountability to your government. Now I am delivering, and the Democrats are FURIOUS.

_source.content: It Wasn't Pretty But It's 2 Standings Points: Capitals Beat Blue Jackets 4-3 in OTThe Washington Capitals headed into an 10-day break (All-Star weekend plus the team's bye week), but they had this one last road game tonight against the Columbus Blue Jackets. Thankfully, the Caps pulled out a 4-3 OT win to wrap-up the first half of the season.Here's the scoring summary.Capitals' forward Garnet Hathaway tipped center Lars Eller’s shot to give Washington an early lead in the first period. Then Capitals' D-man Trevor van Riemsdyk extended the lead with a blue-line bomb. That two-goal lead lasted 12 seconds, which is when CBJ's Andrew Peeke needed two deflections to beat Washington goalie Charlie Lindgren.In the second stanza, van Riemsdyk received a great pass from Washington's All-Star Center Evgeny Kuznetsov to restore the Caps’ two-goal lead, but it didn’t last long. It Wasn't Pretty But It's 2 Standings Points: Capitals Beat Blue Jackets 4-3 in OT

The Washington Capitals headed into an 10-day break (All-Star weekend plus the team's bye week), but they had this one last road game tonight against the Columbus Blue Jackets. Thankfully, the Caps pulled out a 4-3 OT win to wrap-up the first half of the season.

Here's the scoring summary.

Capitals' forward Garnet Hathaway tipped center Lars Eller’s shot to give Washington an early lead in the first period. Then Capitals' D-man Trevor van Riemsdyk extended the lead with a blue-line bomb. That two-goal lead lasted 12 seconds, which is when CBJ's Andrew Peeke needed two deflections to beat Washington goalie Charlie Lindgren.

In the second stanza, van Riemsdyk received a great pass from Washington's All-Star Center Evgeny Kuznetsov to restore the Caps’ two-goal lead, but it didn’t last long. Columbus' Eric Robinson smoked T.J. Oshie’s line to score on the rush.

In the third frame, Blue Jackets' "Johnny Hockey" Gaudreau knotted the game at three goals with seven minutes left. The Jackets pushed late, but the Caps survived through regulation. So it was onto 3-on-3 overtime hockey.

In the OT period, Kuznetsov scored in 26 seconds, thanks to a great setup from Washington winger Marcus Johansson.

The Caps need a break. In addition to their full-fledged injuries, there are clearly some players playing through "stuff": Oshie and Ovechkin likely are ailing and I wouldn’t be surprised if D-man Dmitry Orlov is hurting, too. If the last name starts with O, this is a good time to kick back and get a tan. Ten days of very welcome rest begins now.

Next Up: After this 10-day break, the Capitals travel to Boston to take on the No. 1 Bruins in a nationally televised matinee game Feb. 11. It will be the first of a home-and-home, back-to-back series with the second matinee game against the San Jose Sharks the next day here in D.C.

Capitals beat Blue Jackets 4-3 in OT!
#nocaps

card.title: Biden’s China Spy Scandal › American Greatness

_source.content: #China #EspionageBiden’s China Spy ScandalAmerican Greatness ^ | 31 Jan, 2023 | Lloyd Billingsleyhttps://amgreatness.com/2023/01/31/bidens-china-spy-scandal/It’s even worse than his classified documents scandal.Joe Biden is taking heat for the classified documents he stashed at his home and garage. Though well worthy of attention, as Victor Davis Hanson notes, the documents scandal has overshadowed Biden’s indulgence of Chinese spies, on full display in a recent case.“Federal prosecutors in Brooklyn have dropped their case against a New York Police Department officer who had been accused of acting as a foreign agent on behalf of the Chinese regime,” The Epoch Times reports.Baimadajie Angwang, 33, an ethnic Tibetan and naturalized U.S. citizen, was arrested in 2020 for acting as an agent of Beijing, for wire fraud, making false statements, and obstructing an official proceeding. Prosecutors charge that Angwang reported on Chinese citizens, cultivated intelligence sources, and connected Chinese officials with senior contacts in the New York Police Department.The U.S. Attorney’s Office of the Eastern District of New York recently filed a motion asking federal Judge Eric R. Komitee, a Trump nominee, to dismiss the indictment due to “additional information.” The Eastern District did not reveal the information or explain its relevance to the case. The move illuminates official Biden policy toward Chinese espionage in the United States.“The Justice Department is ending a controversial program, launched under the Trump administration, to hunt down Chinese spies,” CBS News reported last year. President Trump’s “China Initiative” targeted China’s theft of trade secrets and intellectual property.As federal prosecutors charged in 2017, MIT professor Gang Chen failed to disclose ties to China and failed to disclose a foreign bank account on a tax document. Prosecutors dropped the case against Chen, but it wasn’t clear what motivated them to act. This was hardly the only proceeding against Chinese agents the Justice Department chose to abandon.In 2020, federal officials changed that Chinese national Tang Juan lied about ties to the Chinese military in order to gain access to the University of California at Davis. The FBI found an April 14, 2019 article on a Xi’an, China, healthcare forum that showed Tang in a military uniform bearing the insignia of the Civilian Cadres of the Chinese People’s Liberation Army (PLA). The FBI also found two other articles listing Tang’s employer as the People’s Liberation Army’s Air Force Medical University (AFMU), also known as the Fourth Military Medical University (FMMU).According to court documents, Tang was part of a PLA operation to send military scientists to the United States with false covers or false statements about their true employment. Military superiors in China tasked the spies to copy and steal information from American institutions.Tang Juan also emerged in the visa fraud case of Song Chen. According to July 20, 2020, court documents, “an active duty People’s Liberation Army (PLA) military scientist who lied to get into the United States, attempted to destroy evidence, and lied extensively to the FBI when interviewed.”The documents also cite Wang Xin, a visiting researcher at the University of California at San Francisco arrested on charges of visa fraud. Wang was “in fact an active duty member in the PLA, at a level that roughly corresponded with the level of major in the United States.” Wang had “emailed UCSF research to his PLA laboratory,” and his supervisor in China tasked Wang “to observe and document the layout of the UCSF lab to replicate it when he returned to China.”The court documents refer to Tang Juan, also in the United States on a J-1 visa. So was a Chinese national identified as “LT,” who gained access to Duke University despite affiliations with “the PLA General Hospital and PLA Medical Academy.” Americans have cause to wonder why the visas were granted in the first place.A simple internet search turned up PLA and CCP ties for Tang Juan and others now facing charges. The court documents do not reveal which U.S. government officials granted the visas, and what they knew when they approved Chinese nationals with PLA and Chinese Communist Party (CCP) ties.
_source.contentraw:
#China #Espionage
Biden’s China Spy Scandal
American Greatness ^ | 31 Jan, 2023 | Lloyd Billingsley
https://amgreatness.com/2023/01/31/bidens-china-spy-scandal/

It’s even worse than his classified documents scandal.

Joe Biden is taking heat for the classified documents he stashed at his home and garage. Though well worthy of attention, as Victor Davis Hanson notes, the documents scandal has overshadowed Biden’s indulgence of Chinese spies, on full display in a recent case.

“Federal prosecutors in Brooklyn have dropped their case against a New York Police Department officer who had been accused of acting as a foreign agent on behalf of the Chinese regime,” The Epoch Times reports.

Baimadajie Angwang, 33, an ethnic Tibetan and naturalized U.S. citizen, was arrested in 2020 for acting as an agent of Beijing, for wire fraud, making false statements, and obstructing an official proceeding. Prosecutors charge that Angwang reported on Chinese citizens, cultivated intelligence sources, and connected Chinese officials with senior contacts in the New York Police Department.

The U.S. Attorney’s Office of the Eastern District of New York recently filed a motion asking federal Judge Eric R. Komitee, a Trump nominee, to dismiss the indictment due to “additional information.” The Eastern District did not reveal the information or explain its relevance to the case. The move illuminates official Biden policy toward Chinese espionage in the United States.

“The Justice Department is ending a controversial program, launched under the Trump administration, to hunt down Chinese spies,” CBS News reported last year. President Trump’s “China Initiative” targeted China’s theft of trade secrets and intellectual property.

As federal prosecutors charged in 2017, MIT professor Gang Chen failed to disclose ties to China and failed to disclose a foreign bank account on a tax document. Prosecutors dropped the case against Chen, but it wasn’t clear what motivated them to act. This was hardly the only proceeding against Chinese agents the Justice Department chose to abandon.

In 2020, federal officials changed that Chinese national Tang Juan lied about ties to the Chinese military in order to gain access to the University of California at Davis. The FBI found an April 14, 2019 article on a Xi’an, China, healthcare forum that showed Tang in a military uniform bearing the insignia of the Civilian Cadres of the Chinese People’s Liberation Army (PLA). The FBI also found two other articles listing Tang’s employer as the People’s Liberation Army’s Air Force Medical University (AFMU), also known as the Fourth Military Medical University (FMMU).

According to court documents, Tang was part of a PLA operation to send military scientists to the United States with false covers or false statements about their true employment. Military superiors in China tasked the spies to copy and steal information from American institutions.

Tang Juan also emerged in the visa fraud case of Song Chen. According to July 20, 2020, court documents, “an active duty People’s Liberation Army (PLA) military scientist who lied to get into the United States, attempted to destroy evidence, and lied extensively to the FBI when interviewed.”

The documents also cite Wang Xin, a visiting researcher at the University of California at San Francisco arrested on charges of visa fraud. Wang was “in fact an active duty member in the PLA, at a level that roughly corresponded with the level of major in the United States.” Wang had “emailed UCSF research to his PLA laboratory,” and his supervisor in China tasked Wang “to observe and document the layout of the UCSF lab to replicate it when he returned to China.”

The court documents refer to Tang Juan, also in the United States on a J-1 visa. So was a Chinese national identified as “LT,” who gained access to Duke University despite affiliations with “the PLA General Hospital and PLA Medical Academy.” Americans have cause to wonder why the visas were granted in the first place.

A simple internet search turned up PLA and CCP ties for Tang Juan and others now facing charges. The court documents do not reveal which U.S. government officials granted the visas, and what they knew when they approved Chinese nationals with PLA and Chinese Communist Party (CCP) ties.

These are my comments, not the authors]Dozens of illegal immigrants camped for a second night in the street outside Manhattan’s Watson Hotel since Sunday, protesting their relocation to a new shelter at the Brooklyn Cruise Terminal.New York City Hall said the removal of the male adults is to make space for immigrant families. But some of those who had been staying at the free three-star NYC hotel rooms after entering the country illegally through the southern border argued that the alternative is not up to scratch.Illegal immigrants told the New York Post that they shared the hotel room with only one person, and sometimes occupied the entire space themselves, including a private bathroom and shower. With easy reach to local shops and businesses, a two-trip MetroCard was also provided to each of them daily, an immigrant said to the outlet.The new facility in Red Hook, featuring clean but communal sinks and toilets, in comparison, is designed to shelter as many as 1,000 single adult men, according to officials. The isolated terminal is the city’s latest opened Humanitarian Emergency Response and Relief Center (HERRC). Videos show its massive open space filled with neatly fitted cots connected to each other.“The cruise ship terminal is better than the homeless shelter, where there were a lot of crazy American men and American men on drugs,’’ a 42-year-old Venezuela immigrant told The Post. “But the cruise ship terminal is not as good as the hotel,” he added.Despite onsite services such as medical care and laundry, several illegal immigrants who had been to the Brooklyn Cruise Terminal over the past weekend warned against the shortage of basic living standards such as heat, blankets, or storage.Fabien Levy, a spokesman for New York City Mayor Eric Adams, rejected claims of unliveable conditions. “[T]he site is offering the same services as all other HERRCs,” Levy wrote in a late Monday post on Twitter, saying he had personally visited the Brooklyn Cruise Terminal to fact-check whispers about cold spaces.“We checked the thermostat and the facility is definitely warm [even saw a man wearing shorts inside],” the post reads.The mayor also promised as he toured the new facility on Monday that healthy food and snacks would be provided onsite, besides heat and blankets. A video recorded onsite also shows the mayor playing ping pong with the illegal immigrants inside the mega-shelter.“We just need to stop the anxiety,” Adams said, according to the footage.NYPD officers have been called in to clear the street, forcing the group of illegal immigrants to break down the tents. Yet many on Monday refused to back down and kept sleeping along the sidewalk of West 57th Street, calling for a solution. Dozens of illegal immigrants camped for a second night in the street outside Manhattan’s Watson Hotel since Sunday, protesting their relocation to a new shelter at the Brooklyn Cruise Terminal.

New York City Hall said the removal of the male adults is to make space for immigrant families. But some of those who had been staying at the free three-star NYC hotel rooms after entering the country illegally through the southern border argued that the alternative is not up to scratch.

Illegal immigrants told the New York Post that they shared the hotel room with only one person, and sometimes occupied the entire space themselves, including a private bathroom and shower. With easy reach to local shops and businesses, a two-trip MetroCard was also provided to each of them daily, an immigrant said to the outlet.

The new facility in Red Hook, featuring clean but communal sinks and toilets, in comparison, is designed to shelter as many as 1,000 single adult men, according to officials. The isolated terminal is the city’s latest opened Humanitarian Emergency Response and Relief Center (HERRC). Videos show its massive open space filled with neatly fitted cots connected to each other.

“The cruise ship terminal is better than the homeless shelter, where there were a lot of crazy American men and American men on drugs,’’ a 42-year-old Venezuela immigrant told The Post. “But the cruise ship terminal is not as good as the hotel,” he added.

Despite onsite services such as medical care and laundry, several illegal immigrants who had been to the Brooklyn Cruise Terminal over the past weekend warned against the shortage of basic living standards such as heat, blankets, or storage.

Fabien Levy, a spokesman for New York City Mayor Eric Adams, rejected claims of unliveable conditions. “[T]he site is offering the same services as all other HERRCs,” Levy wrote in a late Monday post on Twitter, saying he had personally visited the Brooklyn Cruise Terminal to fact-check whispers about cold spaces.

“We checked the thermostat and the facility is definitely warm [even saw a man wearing shorts inside],” the post reads.

The mayor also promised as he toured the new facility on Monday that healthy food and snacks would be provided onsite, besides heat and blankets. A video recorded onsite also shows the mayor playing ping pong with the illegal immigrants inside the mega-shelter.

“We just need to stop the anxiety,” Adams said, according to the footage.

NYPD officers have been called in to clear the street, forcing the group of illegal immigrants to break down the tents. Yet many on Monday refused to back down and kept sleeping along the sidewalk of West 57th Street, calling for a solution. Migrant activists and volunteers offer daily supplies such as food and water to the group.

Shahana Hanif, chair of the New York City Council’s Immigration Committee, condemned the forced removal of the illegal immigrants. Representing Brooklyn’s 39th District, the councilwoman urged the Adams administration to “prioritize keeping people in proper brick-and-mortar facilities,” according to a Monday statement…

In the Bible, saints are called to revere, worship, and pray to God alone.”

https://www.gotquestions.org/saints-Christian.html

A “cult” is deemed so because it claims to have faith in Jesus (wrong “Jesus”, but that’s another story), quote Scripture passages (WAY out of Biblical context) and fails to follow Him and Him ALONE. They do a good job of telling people about Jesus but fail to teach anyone about His finished work on the cross or His Resurrection. There’s ALWAYS someone else as a “leader”. Examples: Charles “Taze” Russell of Jehovah’s Witnesses, Moses of the Hebrew Roots Movement (an offshoot of the false religion of Judaism), the pope/a priest/Mary of Roman Catholicism, Mary Baker Eddy of Christian Science, Joseph Smith of Latter Day Saints, L. Ron Hubbard of Scientology, Ellen G. White of Seventh Day Adventism, Eric vonAnderseck of Second Eighth Week Apostles and so on. Additionally, there are no contradictions in Scripture...EVER. It’s cults which add to Calvary, not God The Father.

An incorrect version of “Jesus” exists in ANY cult which includes those “salvation by works” people. It’s totally impossible to “earn a gift”. No “Jesus” in false religions. One doesn’t HAVE TO do things pertaining to Christianity, he or she GETS to. HUMONGOUS difference.) Christianity doesn’t teach anything like either “salvation by works” or “religion” (see Romans 6:23 for more information). Additionally, Scripture is BEYOND clear in 2 Corinthians 5:8 (absent with the body = present with God The Father).

By contrast, salvation is “Just Jesus at Calvary and with His Resurrection. No artificial anything”. (“The Gospel message ONLY”, in other words – Keyword: “ONLY”). Someone born again is only qualified to teach the new covenant (2 Corinthians 3:4-11). As such, that person is a partaker in the Divine Nature (2 Peter 1:3-4). We’re under grace. Jesus fulfilled 100% of the law. Because of that, God The Father changes what you want should you decide to choose in His favor. (See Romans 5:10 and Hebrews 10:14 for more information.) People aren’t robots. A person ultimately only affects him or herself and forever’s a long time. We’re under grace. Jesus fulfilled 100% of the law.

According to Ephesians 5:11, instructions are to have nothing to do with the deeds of darkness but rather expose them and according to 1 John 4:1, instructions are to test the spirits.

Over the years, there has been quite a lot taught about Christianity. The problem is, many of those things simply are not in The Bible. Makes one wonder at times - Human opinion versus God The Father’s opinion...Wonder who would win? Additionally, Mosaic Law and/or other types of Legalism - Sad, huh? One thing to also remember is that there are dozens of each, cults and false religions. Many of them have done a SPECTACULAR job of messing up the Gospel message with either bogus teachings, fake literature based on fake Bibles and so on.

Sometimes love must be tough. The desire is for everyone to hit as close to 100% as possible of everything for which God The Father created that person, self included. No one is perfect and there is no one righteous...AT ALL (Isaiah 64:6, John 8:7, Romans 3:10-12, Romans 3:21-26). EVERYONE needs a savior (1 John 1:8-10). As long as a person is able to identify from the heart with the death, burial and resurrection of Jesus...ONLY...that person is justified (Galatians 2:20-21, Romans 5:10, Romans 6:5, 2 Corinthians 5:17). Anything above and beyond that is merely some human attempting to push some “religion”, or “sin management”, or “man-plan”. (SIDE NOTE – The term “Christ” is a title, not a name. It means either “The Anointed One” or “Messiah”.)

Good morning❗ ☕🇺🇸

✝️ 📜🌄 Daily Bible verse
Give thanks in all circumstances; for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus for you.
1 Thessalonians 5:18

🌄🙏 Morning prayer
Lord help us to be grateful for the opportunities we have today, and to take advantage of each one and follow it to fruition.*
🙏 In Jesus' name we pray. Amen.

🌄 Having a grateful heart, being thankful for all God’s blessings, great and small, makes for a fulfilling life.
Let's all make the day count.*

*Charlie Daniels

📣 It's Wednesday, February 1, 2023, and the Obama/Biden administration was/(is) the most corrupt in US history. #Obamagate.
- Dan Bongino

⏱💣 2 Years and 12 days of a "hostage situation." - Juanita Broaddrick

🇺🇸🖋️Biden Executive actions: 675 as of January 29, 2023, including 106 executive orders, 121 presidential memoranda, 377 proclamations, and 71 notices. (Ballotpedia)
The Biden Recession: The Dow is down. Unemployment rate is 3.5%. Inflation is 6.5%. 💥

Gas is $3.51/gallon. (AAA)

RCP averages: Joe's job approval rating spread is -9.7%. 🙄
His job approval avg.: 42.8%.👎 Where is the blowback from his classified document obfuscation and UPenn? More classified documents "discovered". Unlike Trump, Biden did not have the power to declassify.
Quinnipiac reports: 38%, -15.

Build The Wall
After reaching agreements with private property owners, TX takes over building the border wall, starting with 7 miles near Del Rio.
Gov. Abbott creates Texas border czar position and hires Mike Banks, a recently retired border patrol agent, to fill it.
Biden should be impeached for failing to protect the border and U.S citizens.

On Covid
CDC Panel votes to add Covid-19 Jab to Recommended Childhood Schedule. Resist until all the jab information is released. Children are not susceptible to Covid. These vaccinations are irreversible.
The Washington Post (gasp) reported that 58% of coronavirus deaths in August were people who were vaccinated or boosted. More sudden deaths. Anti Covid vaxxers and vaccine-injured protest outside the BBC in London.

Law and Order
November 19, 2022, Judge Loretta Preska ordered dozens of documents related to Jeffrey Epstein's associates to be unsealed, according to Daily Mail.
Since then, crickets.🦗

Current events
In AZ, Kari Lake held a Save Arizona Rally Sunday. POTUS Trump called in to offer his support. Kari claims 200,000 failed? votes have been found. The appeals court rules today.
Paul Pelosi's police surveillance video(s) were released.
Kevin McCarthy 👢ed Adam Schiff and Eric Swalwell from the Intelligence committee and explained to Minority Leader Jeffries that they are untrustworthy (with facts!)
Ilhan Omar says it is racist (imagine that) to boot her from the Foreign Affairs committee, and says some Republicans will vote for her.
The Daily Mail just reported that there has been a DNA match to prove that Ilhan married her brother to break immigration laws. And they now confirm that Omar reported years ago to friends she had indeed married her brother. Prosecute!
Federal prosecutors said Sam Bankman-Fried has made “recent attempts” to contact prospective witnesses in his criminal case, and are asking for new conditions of his release.
✈️ The FAA paused all domestic departures in the US on the morning of January 11th because its Notice to Air Missions system failed. Contractors working on the FAA's NOTAM system, it seems, deleted some crucial files by accident. 🤦‍♀️
24 year old Bills' Damar Hamlin continues to recuperate at home.
Twitter Files drop. Before Elon Musk steps aside as Chief Twit, I would like to propose that he return all Trump Supporters' suspended accounts. Otherwise, Twitter will n e v e r again be a public forum.
Joe Biden and the BLS LIED about creating a million jobs March-June 2022, setting the stage for 7 interest rate hikes last year. Turns out only 10,500 jobs were created.😠
Nancy Pelosi and J6 committee tried to hide evidence for 30-50 years in the National Archives.🔍 New House Rules may make evidence available now. 🤞 Justice for J6 prisoners!
Lycoming County, PA hand-recounted almost 60,000 votes for president. POTUS Trump lost 8 votes in the recount. Joe Biden lost 15. Now, will Philadelphia do a recount?
Another 1.75 trillion dollars swooshed out of D.C. in the dem's latest Green New Deal, assisted by RINOS.
Joe's 106 E.O.s have cost taxpayers upwards of 1.5 trillion dollars❗

⛴️ ⛓️
Food shortages and supply chain issues abound, not to mention airlines are in free fall, and now the FAA. Fire the incompetent Mayor Pete❗
And NOT by running him for Prez ❗

SCOTUS will decide Moore vs. Harper to determine ISL authority to regulate elections. Chief Justice Roberts says probe failed to identify SCOTUS leaker 👎 UNACCEPTABLE ❗

Billions more US dollars sent to Ukraine.💸

POTUS 45
Trump campaigned in NH and SC Saturday❗ MAGA❗
Free speech ❗

Today is National Dark Chocolate Day ❗

_source.content: 聊聊吉他英雄跟乐队。更多侧重于金属乐队。eric clapton这种我就真不了解。纯粹是我的主观看法，因为我本人实力很差，了解肯定不够深入。也不会因为喜欢什么音乐就有了什么身份认同。我个人平时有在玩bass，自己买了一把没事在网上看看tab谱子自己跟着弹的水平，但是很糟糕就是了。但是我喜欢更多的可能是吉他手。初代吉他英雄应该是吉米亨德里克斯，但是我不太有感觉，一个是他是个吸毒酗酒的左逼，最后被自己呕吐物呛死了；另一个是我觉得那个是古典吉他手还没参战的时候。之前看过一个漫画叫《历经弦音》来着，大概就是融合那个十字路口传说（吉他弹得好的都是把灵魂卖给了恶魔），然后加上死了的吉他手附身这种。看到吉米亨还行，但是后面出现了柯特科本。不说他音乐怎么样，至少科本的吉他比他的音乐烂。https://youtu.be/qFfnlYbFEiE然后就是柯特科本那个时候。我觉得可以用一个之前看到过的老白男的评论概括：摇滚最早是不懂音乐的普通人搞出来的，然后之后熟知乐理的人喜欢这种元素就进行改造，有了前卫摇滚这种东西，摇滚要比前卫低级一点。那段”摇滚文化“流行的时间，我的印象就是吸毒酗酒强奸这种东西。柯特科本，Slash收获了大量名声。然后出现了一个定律”女性粉丝越多的乐队越不行“。当然这个时候真正能演奏的乐队也有很多，比如King Crimson，但是名气比这些”摇滚文化“乐队要小得多。https://youtu.be/edqH0ofRQrM然后是yngwie那个时候，其实这个划分也是我主观划的，时间上肯定不对。作为吉他上的新古典主义之父（跟古典的新古典不一样），可以说开启了吉他技术军备竞赛。虽然按照无影手安格鲁的说法，其实yngwie出现之前他们的圈子里已经在技术上很成熟了。我第一次被乐器吸引其实也是听了yngwie第一张专辑《rasing force》里面的black star这首曲子。那个时候感觉有大量的吉他手被人熟知 Jason becker，marty freidman ，michael angelo batio等等。当然michael angelo我觉得还是真正的吉他英雄。第一个他弹得是真的快而且干净，第二个他很热心于教人弹。虽然他自己的曲子可能有点过于执着于技术了。那个时候的大部分乐队solo，感觉就是各种爬音阶，简单干脆暴力。https://youtu.be/E2hZDzJp9Pchttps://youtu.be/hb5QaCfm7bghttps://youtu.be/t-y0wkTYCIQ后来就是学院派时代。当然各种”摇滚文化“”金属文化“的乐队也很多，但是我觉得社群里被人承认和推崇的已经不是Slash，Dave mustaine，kerry king这种”某某文化“代表了。这个时期的吉他英雄，我觉得可以说是完全体了。梦剧院的john petrucci，巴西的angra的 kiko loureiro，symphony x的michael romeo。大家的穿着打扮也从各种花里胡哨变成衬衫牛仔裤帆布鞋。什么"摇滚文化"”金属文化“，崇尚这些东西感觉更多的会被人当成poser。当然这些乐队基本是没有女性粉丝的。也有一条定律”黑人和金属互斥“。芬兰这种白人从小受音乐训练的国家有了大量知名金属乐队。我最喜欢的还是 children of bodom。这个时候的乐队乐手我感觉不学古典音乐可以说完全混不下去。当然在赚钱和名气层面上当然是混得下去。像slipknot，玛丽莲曼森，林肯公园这种就是能赚但不行的。https://youtu.be/inOgcWvKCbIhttps://youtu.be/zEHbe2Wtch4https://youtu.be/LJroikWySNU后来就是这个前卫音乐更受到大众接受的时代，我觉得要归功于YouTube这种媒体，各种个人和乐队都能得到传播的机会，比如max ostro这种吉他手。当然我觉得女性粉丝还是应该几乎没有的。然后这个时候的吉他手弹的技巧更复杂了。各种风格也融合的更多。我感觉代表人物就是Tim Henson。我看他弹琴感觉手都有点难受。这个时候如果你拿一把hello kitty的吉他人们会觉得你是个真正的吉他手，拿一把bc rich反而更像是个poser。https://youtu.be/Z5NoQg8LdDk总结一下就是兜兜转转，最后大家还是选择了古典乐。流行乐越来越烂的时候，现代乐器的演奏越来越回归古典，然后再从古典乐进行改编。把什么音乐种类当成偶像来拜，我觉得这种音乐就完蛋，当成元素来融合反而能得到发展。所以我不喜欢什么”摇滚文化“”金属文化“还有emo，hair metal这种。音乐做的好就是好，坏就是坏。日本音乐融了无数次之后，支那人还在抱着”国风音乐”这种概念各种抄，支那民族性就是拜偶像的。当然全时期吉他英雄还是高玩哥guthrie govan，然后贝斯英雄我觉得是victor _source.contentraw:
聊聊吉他英雄跟乐队。更多侧重于金属乐队。eric clapton这种我就真不了解。纯粹是我的主观看法，因为我本人实力很差，了解肯定不够深入。也不会因为喜欢什么音乐就有了什么身份认同。
我个人平时有在玩bass，自己买了一把没事在网上看看tab谱子自己跟着弹的水平，但是很糟糕就是了。但是我喜欢更多的可能是吉他手。
初代吉他英雄应该是吉米亨德里克斯，但是我不太有感觉，一个是他是个吸毒酗酒的左逼，最后被自己呕吐物呛死了；另一个是我觉得那个是古典吉他手还没参战的时候。之前看过一个漫画叫《历经弦音》来着，大概就是融合那个十字路口传说（吉他弹得好的都是把灵魂卖给了恶魔），然后加上死了的吉他手附身这种。看到吉米亨还行，但是后面出现了柯特科本。不说他音乐怎么样，至少科本的吉他比他的音乐烂。
https://youtu.be/qFfnlYbFEiE
然后就是柯特科本那个时候。我觉得可以用一个之前看到过的老白男的评论概括：摇滚最早是不懂音乐的普通人搞出来的，然后之后熟知乐理的人喜欢这种元素就进行改造，有了前卫摇滚这种东西，摇滚要比前卫低级一点。那段”摇滚文化“流行的时间，我的印象就是吸毒酗酒强奸这种东西。柯特科本，Slash收获了大量名声。然后出现了一个定律”女性粉丝越多的乐队越不行“。当然这个时候真正能演奏的乐队也有很多，比如King Crimson，但是名气比这些”摇滚文化“乐队要小得多。
https://youtu.be/edqH0ofRQrM
然后是yngwie那个时候，其实这个划分也是我主观划的，时间上肯定不对。作为吉他上的新古典主义之父（跟古典的新古典不一样），可以说开启了吉他技术军备竞赛。虽然按照无影手安格鲁的说法，其实yngwie出现之前他们的圈子里已经在技术上很成熟了。我第一次被乐器吸引其实也是听了yngwie第一张专辑《rasing force》里面的black star这首曲子。那个时候感觉有大量的吉他手被人熟知 Jason becker，marty freidman ，michael angelo batio等等。当然michael angelo我觉得还是真正的吉他英雄。第一个他弹得是真的快而且干净，第二个他很热心于教人弹。虽然他自己的曲子可能有点过于执着于技术了。那个时候的大部分乐队solo，感觉就是各种爬音阶，简单干脆暴力。
https://youtu.be/E2hZDzJp9Pc
https://youtu.be/hb5QaCfm7bg
https://youtu.be/t-y0wkTYCIQ
后来就是学院派时代。当然各种”摇滚文化“”金属文化“的乐队也很多，但是我觉得社群里被人承认和推崇的已经不是Slash，Dave mustaine，kerry king这种”某某文化“代表了。这个时期的吉他英雄，我觉得可以说是完全体了。梦剧院的john petrucci，巴西的angra的 kiko loureiro，symphony x的michael romeo。大家的穿着打扮也从各种花里胡哨变成衬衫牛仔裤帆布鞋。什么"摇滚文化"”金属文化“，崇尚这些东西感觉更多的会被人当成poser。当然这些乐队基本是没有女性粉丝的。也有一条定律”黑人和金属互斥“。芬兰这种白人从小受音乐训练的国家有了大量知名金属乐队。我最喜欢的还是 children of bodom。这个时候的乐队乐手我感觉不学古典音乐可以说完全混不下去。当然在赚钱和名气层面上当然是混得下去。像slipknot，玛丽莲曼森，林肯公园这种就是能赚但不行的。
https://youtu.be/inOgcWvKCbI
https://youtu.be/zEHbe2Wtch4
https://youtu.be/LJroikWySNU
后来就是这个前卫音乐更受到大众接受的时代，我觉得要归功于YouTube这种媒体，各种个人和乐队都能得到传播的机会，比如max ostro这种吉他手。当然我觉得女性粉丝还是应该几乎没有的。然后这个时候的吉他手弹的技巧更复杂了。各种风格也融合的更多。我感觉代表人物就是Tim Henson。我看他弹琴感觉手都有点难受。这个时候如果你拿一把hello kitty的吉他人们会觉得你是个真正的吉他手，拿一把bc rich反而更像是个poser。
https://youtu.be/Z5NoQg8LdDk
总结一下就是兜兜转转，最后大家还是选择了古典乐。流行乐越来越烂的时候，现代乐器的演奏越来越回归古典，然后再从古典乐进行改编。把什么音乐种类当成偶像来拜，我觉得这种音乐就完蛋，当成元素来融合反而能得到发展。所以我不喜欢什么”摇滚文化“”金属文化“还有emo，hair metal这种。音乐做的好就是好，坏就是坏。日本音乐融了无数次之后，支那人还在抱着”国风音乐”这种概念各种抄，支那民族性就是拜偶像的。
当然全时期吉他英雄还是高玩哥guthrie govan，然后贝斯英雄我觉得是victor wooten。荣誉提名一下日本的GALNERYUS和它的吉他手syu。
https://youtu.be/9D0WuVE8dQU
https://youtu.be/zjkFJkbm3vA
https://youtu.be/prBxPljqt0M
